response.overview: In a small and conservative Scottish village, a woman's paralytic husband convinces her to have extramarital intercourse so she can tell him about it and give him a reason for living.
response.title: Breaking the Waves

release_dates.note: Cherbourg-Octeville Festival of Irish and British Film
Film by the Sea Film Festival

results.name: The Restless Cinematography of BREAKING THE WAVES
